mapper.select: SELECT AA.COMPANY_CD , AA.USER_ID , AA.EMP_NO , COALESCE(AA.KORN_NM, ' ') AS USER_NAME , COALESCE(AA.ENGL_NM, ' ') AS ENGL_NM , AA.DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , DP.DEPT_KORN_NM AS DEPT_KORN_NM , DP.DEPT_ENGL_NM AS DEPT_ENGL_NM , COALESCE(AA.USER_FLAG_CD, ' ') AS USER_FLAG_CD , COALESCE(AA.HOOF_STAT_CD, ' ') AS HOOF_STAT_CD , COALESCE(AA.WKGD_CD, ' ') AS WKGD_CD , COALESCE(AA.WKDT_CD, ' ') AS WKDT_CD , COALESCE(AA.OCCU_CD, ' ') AS OCCU_CD , COALESCE(AA.CHAG_WORK, ' ') AS CHAG_WORK , '0' AS CHECK_LOGIN2_YN , AA.THEME_ID AS THEME_ID , AA.REGI_NUMB , AA.CELL_NUMB , AA.EMAIL FROM T_SYTM_USER AA , T_SYTM_DEPT DP WHERE AA.COMPANY_CD = DP.COMPANY_CD AND AA.DEPT_CD = DP.DEPT_CD AND AA.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND AA.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND AA.PASSWORD = #{USER_PASSWORD} AND AA.HOOF_STAT_CD != 'RT' ;

SELECT AA.COMPANY_CD , AA.USER_ID , AA.EMP_NO , COALESCE(AA.KORN_NM, ' ') AS USER_NAME , COALESCE(AA.ENGL_NM, ' ') AS ENGL_NM , AA.DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , DP.DEPT_KORN_NM AS DEPT_KORN_NM , DP.DEPT_ENGL_NM AS DEPT_ENGL_NM , COALESCE(AA.USER_FLAG_CD, ' ') AS USER_FLAG_CD , COALESCE(AA.HOOF_STAT_CD, ' ') AS HOOF_STAT_CD , COALESCE(AA.WKGD_CD, ' ') AS WKGD_CD , COALESCE(AA.WKDT_CD, ' ') AS WKDT_CD , COALESCE(AA.OCCU_CD, ' ') AS OCCU_CD , COALESCE(AA.CHAG_WORK, ' ') AS CHAG_WORK , '0' AS CHECK_LOGIN2_YN , AA.THEME_ID AS THEME_ID , AA.REGI_NUMB , AA.CELL_NUMB , AA.EMAIL FROM T_SYTM_USER AA , T_SYTM_DEPT DP WHERE AA.COMPANY_CD = DP.COMPANY_CD AND AA.DEPT_CD = DP.DEPT_CD AND AA.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND AA.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND AA.HOOF_STAT_CD != 'RT' ;

SELECT MSGE_CD /* 메시지 코드 */ , MSGE_FLAG_CD /* 메시지 구분 코드 */ , KORN_MSGE /* 메시지 한글 */ , COALESCE(ENGL_MSGE, KORN_MSGE) AS ENGL_MSGE /* 메시지 영문 */ FROM T_SYTM_MSG WHERE USED_YN = '1' /* 사용중인 메시지만 조회 */ ORDER BY MSGE_CD

SELECT SSC_NUMB /* 소분류번호 */ , SSC_CD /* 소분류코드 */ , SSC_CD AS CODE /* 소분류코드 NEXT */ , HCL_CD /* 대분류코드 */ , SSC_CD_KORN_NM /* 소분류코드 한글명 */ , SSC_CD_KORN_NM AS CAPTION /* 소분류코드 한글명 NEXT */ , COALESCE(SSC_CD_ENGL_NM, SSC_CD_KORN_NM) AS SSC_CD_ENGL_NM /* 소분류코드 영문명 */ , ABBR_KORN_NM /* 약어 한글명 */ , COALESCE(ABBR_ENGL_NM, ABBR_KORN_NM) AS ABBR_ENGL_NM /* 약어 영문명 */ , GRP_CD_1 /* 그룹코드 1 */ , GRP_CD_2 /* 그룹코드 2 */ , GRP_CD_3 /* 그룹코드 3 */ , GRP_CD_4 /* 그룹코드 4 */ , GRP_CD_5 /* 그룹코드 5 */ , GRP_CD_6 /* 그룹코드 6 */ , GRP_CD_7 /* 그룹코드 7 */ , GRP_CD_8 /* 그룹코드 8 */ , GRP_CD_9 /* 그룹코드 9 */ , SORT_ORDR /* 정렬 순서 */ , USED_YN /* 사용여부 */ , REMK /* 비고 */ FROM T_SYTM_CODE WHERE USED_YN = '1' /* 사용중인 코드만 조회 */ AND COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} ORDER BY HCL_CD, SORT_ORDR

SELECT MM.SYTM_FLAG_CD , MM.MENU_ID , MM.USER_ID , MM.SORT_ORDR , SM.MENU_NM , SM.MENU_ENGL_NM AS MENU_NM_EN , SM.MODULE_CD , SM.PRGM_ID , PR.PRGM_PATH , PR.PRGM_PATH AS PRGM_FULL_PATH FROM T_SYTM_MYMENU MM INNER JOIN T_SYTM_MENU SM ON MM.MENU_ID = SM.MENU_ID INNER JOIN T_SYTM_PRGM PR ON SM.PRGM_ID = PR.PRGM_ID WHERE MM.USER_ID = #{strUserId} AND MM.SYTM_FLAG_CD = #{strUserConSysFlag} AND MM.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} ORDER BY MM.SORT_ORDR

SELECT /* searchAddBtn */ K.COMPANY_CD, K.SYTM_FLAG_CD , K.MENU_ID , K.BTTN_ID , PB.SORT_CD , PB.SORT_ORDR , PB.BTTN_NM , PB.BTTN_ENGL_NM , PB.BTTN_STYLE FROM ( SELECT A.COMPANY_CD, A.SYTM_FLAG_CD , A.MENU_ID , A.BTTN_ID , SUM(A.CNT) AS CNT FROM ( /* 그룹별 권한 */ SELECT D.COMPANY_CD , D.SYTM_FLAG_CD , D.MENU_ID , D.BTTN_ID , COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T_SYTM_PERM_GRP A INNER JOIN T_SYTM_PERM_USER B ON A.SYTM_FLAG_CD = B.SYTM_FLAG_CD AND A.PERM_ID = B.PERM_ID AND B.USER_ID = #{strUserId} AND B.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} INNER JOIN T_SYTM_PERM_MENU C ON A.SYTM_FLAG_CD = C.SYTM_FLAG_CD AND A.PERM_ID = C.PERM_ID AND C.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} INNER JOIN T_SYTM_PERM_MENU_ADD_BTN D ON A.SYTM_FLAG_CD = D.SYTM_FLAG_CD AND A.PERM_ID = D.PERM_ID AND C.MENU_ID = D.MENU_ID AND D.USED_YN = '1' AND D.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} WHERE A.SYTM_FLAG_CD = #{strUserConSysFlag} AND A.USED_YN = '1' AND A.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} GROUP BY D.SYTM_FLAG_CD, D.MENU_ID, D.BTTN_ID UNION ALL /* 사용자별 권한 */ SELECT C.COMPANY_CD , C.SYTM_FLAG_CD , C.MENU_ID , C.BTTN_ID , 1 AS CNT FROM T_SYTM_USER_MENU_ADD_BTN C WHERE C.SYTM_FLAG_CD = #{strUserConSysFlag} AND C.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} AND C.USER_ID = #{strUserId} AND C.USED_YN = '1' ) A GROUP BY A.SYTM_FLAG_CD, A.MENU_ID , A.BTTN_ID ) K INNER JOIN T_SYTM_MENU M ON K.SYTM_FLAG_CD = M.SYTM_FLAG_CD AND K.COMPANY_CD = M.COMPANY_CD AND K.MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID INNER JOIN T_SYTM_PRGM P ON M.PRGM_ID = P.PRGM_ID AND M.COMPANY_CD = P.COMPANY_CD INNER JOIN T_SYTM_PRGM_ADD_BTN PB ON P.PRGM_ID = PB.PRGM_ID AND PB.BTTN_ID = K.BTTN_ID AND PB.COMPANY_CD = K.COMPANY_CD WHERE 1=1 AND PB.USED_YN = '1' ORDER BY K.MENU_ID, PB.SORT_ORDR

/*searchMenuInfo*/ WITH t1 AS ( SELECT A.SYTM_FLAG_CD AS SYTM_FLAG_CD /* 시스템구분코드 */ , A.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , A.MENU_NM AS MENU_NM /* 메뉴명 */ , A.MODULE_CD AS MODULE_CD /* 모듈*/ , A.MENU_LVL AS MENU_LV /* 메뉴레벨 */ , A.HIPO_MENU_ID AS HIPO_MENU_ID /* 상위메뉴ID */ , A.PRGM_ID AS PRGM_ID /* 프로그램ID */ , A.PRGM_PATH AS PRGM_PATH /* 프로그램경로 */ ,IF(A.PRGM_HELP IS NOT NULL, 'true', '') AS PRGM_HELP_FLAG /* 프로그램매뉴얼 유무 */ , '' AS PRGM_FILE_NM /* 프로그램파일명 */ , A.PRGM_PATH AS MENU_URL /* 메뉴URL */ , A.MENU_ENGL_NM AS MENU_ENGL_NM /* 메뉴영문명 */ , A.MENU_FLAG_CD AS MENU_FLAG_CD /* 메뉴구분코드 */ , A.MENU_ORDR AS MENU_ORDR /* 메뉴순서 */ , A.REMK AS REMK /* 비고 */ , A.PARM AS PARM /* 파라미터 */ , A.INQR_BTTN_USED_YN AS CMMNBTNSEARCH /* 조회버튼사용여부 */ , A.ANEW_BTTN_USED_YN AS CMMNBTNADD /* 신규버튼사용여부 */ , A.DELE_BTTN_USED_YN AS CMMNBTNDEL /* 삭제버튼사용여부 */ , A.SAVE_BTTN_USED_YN AS CMMNBTNSAVE /* 저장버튼사용여부 */ , A.PRNT_BTTN_USED_YN AS CMMNBTNPRINT /* 출력버튼사용여부 */ , A.EXCL_BTTN_USED_YN AS CMMNBTNEXCELDOWN /* 엑셀버튼사용여부 */ , A.INIT_BTTN_USED_YN AS CMMNBTNINIT /* 초기화버튼사용여부 */ , A.SEARCH_SCOPE_CD AS SEARCH_SCOPE_CD /* 조회권한 */ FROM ( SELECT A.SYTM_FLAG_CD , A.MENU_ID , A.HIPO_MENU_ID , A.MENU_NM , A.MENU_ENGL_NM , A.REMK , A.MENU_FLAG_CD , A.MENU_ORDR , A.MENU_LVL , A.PARM , B.INQR_BTTN_USED_YN , B.ANEW_BTTN_USED_YN , B.SAVE_BTTN_USED_YN , B.DELE_BTTN_USED_YN , B.PRNT_BTTN_USED_YN , B.EXCL_BTTN_USED_YN , B.INIT_BTTN_USED_YN , B.SEARCH_SCOPE_CD , A.PRGM_ID , P.PRGM_PATH , P.PRGM_HELP , A.MODULE_CD FROM T_SYTM_MENU A INNER JOIN ( /* 전체 권한 */ SELECT A.MENU_ID , MAX(A.INQR_BTTN_USED_YN) AS INQR_BTTN_USED_YN , MAX(A.ANEW_BTTN_USED_YN) AS ANEW_BTTN_USED_YN , MAX(A.SAVE_BTTN_USED_YN) AS SAVE_BTTN_USED_YN , MAX(A.DELE_BTTN_USED_YN) AS DELE_BTTN_USED_YN , MAX(A.PRNT_BTTN_USED_YN) AS PRNT_BTTN_USED_YN , MAX(A.EXCL_BTTN_USED_YN) AS EXCL_BTTN_USED_YN , MAX(A.INIT_BTTN_USED_YN) AS INIT_BTTN_USED_YN , MIN(A.SEARCH_SCOPE_CD) AS SEARCH_SCOPE_CD FROM ( /* 그룹별 권한 */ SELECT C.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , C.INQR_BTTN_USED_YN , C.ANEW_BTTN_USED_YN , C.SAVE_BTTN_USED_YN , C.DELE_BTTN_USED_YN , C.PRNT_BTTN_USED_YN , C.EXCL_BTTN_USED_YN , C.INIT_BTTN_USED_YN , C.SEARCH_SCOPE_CD FROM T_SYTM_PERM_GRP A INNER JOIN T_SYTM_PERM_USER B ON A.SYTM_FLAG_CD = B.SYTM_FLAG_CD AND A.PERM_ID = B.PERM_ID AND B.USER_ID = #{strUserId} AND B.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} INNER JOIN T_SYTM_PERM_MENU C ON A.SYTM_FLAG_CD = C.SYTM_FLAG_CD AND A.PERM_ID = C.PERM_ID AND C.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} WHERE A.SYTM_FLAG_CD = #{strUserConSysFlag} AND A.USED_YN = '1' AND A.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} UNION ALL /* 사용자별 권한 */ SELECT C.MENU_ID , C.INQR_BTTN_USED_YN , C.ANEW_BTTN_USED_YN , C.SAVE_BTTN_USED_YN , C.DELE_BTTN_USED_YN , C.PRNT_BTTN_USED_YN , C.EXCL_BTTN_USED_YN , C.INIT_BTTN_USED_YN , C.SEARCH_SCOPE_CD FROM T_SYTM_USER_MENU C WHERE C.SYTM_FLAG_CD = #{strUserConSysFlag} AND C.USER_ID = #{strUserId} AND C.COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} ) A GROUP BY MENU_ID ) B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PRGM_ID, PRGM_PATH, PRGM_HELP FROM T_SYTM_PRGM WHERE USED_YN = '1' AND COMPANY_CD = #{strCompanyCd} ) P ON A.PRGM_ID = P.PRGM_ID WHERE A.USED_YN = '1' ORDER BY A.MENU_LVL, A.MENU_ORDR ) A ), CTE_MAIN AS ( WITH RECURSIVE t2 AS ( SELECT CAST(LPAD(a.MENU_ORDR,3,'0') AS CHAR(255)) as SortOrder ,a.SYTM_FLAG_CD ,a.MENU_ID ,a.MENU_NM ,a.MODULE_CD ,a.MENU_LV ,a.HIPO_MENU_ID ,a.PRGM_ID ,a.PRGM_PATH ,a.PRGM_FILE_NM ,a.MENU_URL ,a.MENU_ENGL_NM ,a.MENU_FLAG_CD ,a.MENU_ORDR ,a.REMK ,a.PARM ,a.CMMNBTNSEARCH ,a.CMMNBTNADD ,a.CMMNBTNDEL ,a.CMMNBTNSAVE ,a.CMMNBTNPRINT ,a.CMMNBTNEXCELDOWN ,a.CMMNBTNINIT ,a.SEARCH_SCOPE_CD ,CAST(a.MENU_ID AS CHAR(255)) AS MENU_PATH /* 메뉴 Path */ ,CAST(a.MENU_NM AS CHAR(255)) AS DISPLAY_PATH /* 표시용 한글메뉴 Path */ ,CAST(a.MENU_ENGL_NM AS CHAR(255)) AS ENGL_DISPLAY_PATH /* 표시용 영문메뉴 Path */ ,a.PRGM_HELP_FLAG FROM t1 AS a WHERE a.HIPO_MENU_ID = '0000000000' UNION ALL SELECT CAST(CONCAT(c.SORTORDER, '|', LPAD(b.MENU_ORDR,3,'0')) AS CHAR(255)) as BOARD_ORDER ,b.SYTM_FLAG_CD ,b.MENU_ID ,b.MENU_NM ,b.MODULE_CD ,b.MENU_LV ,b.HIPO_MENU_ID ,b.PRGM_ID ,b.PRGM_PATH ,b.PRGM_FILE_NM ,b.MENU_URL ,b.MENU_ENGL_NM ,b.MENU_FLAG_CD ,b.MENU_ORDR ,b.REMK ,b.PARM ,b.CMMNBTNSEARCH ,b.CMMNBTNADD ,b.CMMNBTNDEL ,b.CMMNBTNSAVE ,b.CMMNBTNPRINT ,b.CMMNBTNEXCELDOWN ,b.CMMNBTNINIT ,b.SEARCH_SCOPE_CD ,CAST(CONCAT(c.MENU_PATH, ',', b.MENU_ID) AS CHAR(255)) AS MENU_PATH ,REGEXP_REPLACE(CAST(CONCAT(c.DISPLAY_PATH , ' > ' , b.MENU_NM) AS CHAR(255)), '^ > ', '') AS DISPLAY_PATH ,REGEXP_REPLACE(CAST(CONCAT(c.ENGL_DISPLAY_PATH, ' > ', b.MENU_ENGL_NM) AS CHAR(255)), '^ > ', '') as ENGL_DISPLAY_PATH ,b.PRGM_HELP_FLAG FROM t1 AS b INNER JOIN t2 c ON b.HIPO_MENU_ID = c.MENU_ID ) SELECT * FROM t2
) SELECT * FROM CTE_MAIN ORDER BY SortOrder
SELECT THEME_ID FROM T_SYTM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{strUserId}

SELECT SSC_NUMB /* 소분류번호 */ , SSC_CD /* 소분류코드 */ , HCL_CD /* 대분류코드 */ , SSC_CD_KORN_NM /* 소분류코드 한글명 */ , COALESCE(SSC_CD_ENGL_NM, SSC_CD_KORN_NM) AS SSC_CD_ENGL_NM /* 소분류코드 영문명 */ , ABBR_KORN_NM /* 약어 한글명 */ , COALESCE(ABBR_ENGL_NM, ABBR_KORN_NM) AS ABBR_ENGL_NM /* 약어 영문명 */ , GRP_CD_1 /* 그룹코드 1 */ , GRP_CD_2 /* 그룹코드 2 */ , GRP_CD_3 /* 그룹코드 3 */ , GRP_CD_4 /* 그룹코드 4 */ , GRP_CD_5 /* 그룹코드 5 */ , GRP_CD_6 /* 그룹코드 6 */ , GRP_CD_7 /* 그룹코드 7 */ , GRP_CD_8 /* 그룹코드 8 */ , GRP_CD_9 /* 그룹코드 9 */ , SORT_ORDR /* 정렬 순서 */ , USED_YN /* 사용여부 */ , REMK /* 비고 */ FROM T_SYTM_CODE WHERE USED_YN = '1' /* 사용중인 코드만 조회 */ AND HCL_CD = #{HCL_CD} AND COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} ORDER BY HCL_CD, SORT_ORDR

SELECT SSC_NUMB /* 소분류번호 */ , SSC_CD /* 소분류코드 */ , HCL_CD /* 대분류코드 */ , SSC_CD_KORN_NM /* 소분류코드 한글명 */ , COALESCE(SSC_CD_ENGL_NM, SSC_CD_KORN_NM) AS SSC_CD_ENGL_NM /* 소분류코드 영문명 */ , ABBR_KORN_NM /* 약어 한글명 */ , COALESCE(ABBR_ENGL_NM, ABBR_KORN_NM) AS ABBR_ENGL_NM /* 약어 영문명 */ , GRP_CD_1 /* 그룹코드 1 */ , GRP_CD_2 /* 그룹코드 2 */ , GRP_CD_3 /* 그룹코드 3 */ , GRP_CD_4 /* 그룹코드 4 */ , GRP_CD_5 /* 그룹코드 5 */ , GRP_CD_6 /* 그룹코드 6 */ , GRP_CD_7 /* 그룹코드 7 */ , GRP_CD_8 /* 그룹코드 8 */ , GRP_CD_9 /* 그룹코드 9 */ , SORT_ORDR /* 정렬 순서 */ , USED_YN /* 사용여부 */ , REMK /* 비고 */ FROM T_SYTM_CODE WHERE USED_YN = '1' /* 사용중인 코드만 조회 */ AND HCL_CD = #{HCL_CD} ORDER BY HCL_CD, SORT_ORDR
